channel.title: Please post for me a good runserver.bat
channel.description:
I have a problem. It says something about a 'javac' not being recognized. Long story short I either (according to this one kid who was gona help me but hes offline)
1: Don't have the right Runserver.bat info in the notepad [b]or [/b] 2: You don't have the route to your Java info in the notepad right
Will somebody find me a good runserver.bat file. I'm gona start narrowing it down by replacing my current with that and see what i get. ALSO if you know how to do #2 (route my Java to the notepad) please post.

item.title: Please post for me a good runserver.bat
